mathematical operations
[function for interpolation (func)]


Functions

REAL surfit::func_getValue (REAL x, REAL y)
 calculates surfit_func value at point (x,y)
bool surfit::func_resid (const char *filename)
 calculates residuals between surfit_task and surfit_func. Saves result to text file.
REAL surfit::func_D1 ()
 calculates value of for surfit_func
REAL surfit::func_D2 ()
 calculates value of for surfit_func
bool surfit::func_gradient ()
 calculates "map of gradients lengths" from surfit_func and saves result to surfit_func (!)
bool surfit::func_project ()
 recalculates function on surfit_grid using bilinear interpolation algorithm
bool surfit::func_add_noise (REAL std)
 adds normally-distributed noise with parameters N(0,std) to coeff
REAL surfit::func_minz ()
 returns minimum Z-value of surfit_func
REAL surfit::func_maxz ()
 calculates maximum Z-value of surfit_func
REAL surfit::func_mean ()
 calculates mean Z-value of surfit_func
REAL surfit::func_std (REAL mean)
 calculates standard deviation from mean Z-value of surfit_func
REAL surfit::func_sum ()
 calculates sum of all surfit_func cell values
bool surfit::func_plus (func *fnc)
 surfit_func = surfit_func + fnc. Functions sizes must be equal
bool surfit::func_minus (func *fnc)
 surfit_func = surfit_func - fnc. undef_value means no operation. Functions sizes must be equal
bool surfit::func_minus_undef (func *fnc)
 surfit_func = surfit_func - fnc. Functions sizes must be equal.
bool surfit::func_mult (func *fnc)
 surfit_func = surfit_func * fnc. Functions sizes must be equal
bool surfit::func_div (func *fnc)
 surfit_func = surfit_func / fnc. Functions sizes must be equal
bool surfit::func_set (func *fnc)
 surfit_func = fnc. Functions sizes must be equal
bool surfit::func_plus_real (REAL val)
 surfit_func = surfit_func + val
bool surfit::func_mult_real (REAL val)
 surfit_func = surfit_func * val
bool surfit::func_div_real (REAL val)
 surfit_func = surfit_func / val
bool surfit::func_set_real (REAL val)
 surfit_func = val
